data.title: Hunting Monsters:
data.description: The player can attack the monsters that live outside the ranch to drop energy for the Shinytures.

data.title: Hatching Eggs:
data.description: The player can use the hatching machines so that the new Shinytures can be born.

data.title: Gathering Berries:
data.description: The player can find the Berry Trees on the planet to gather a berry.

data.title: Evolving the Shinytures:
data.description: The player can use the Shinytures' DNA and mix it with a berry or energy to create a new evolution of this Shinyture.

data.title: Jump Floating Platforms:
data.description: When the player is on this planet, he will have to jump on mobile platforms to reach new locations.

data.title: Climb Walls:
data.description: The player can climb certain walls to reach unknown places.

data.title: Taking Damage:
data.description: The player can be burned by touching the lava or being attacked by the monsters that inhabit the planet.

data.title: Healing:
data.description: The player regenerates his life when standing on the healing platforms or when inside the Headquarters.

data.title: Respawn:
data.description: Every time the player’s life reaches 0, he will appear in the organization’s headquarters.
